properties.name: outlined
properties.description: Determines whether or not to show the button in an outlined style.

properties.name: link
properties.description: Links the button to an URL.

properties.name: label
properties.description: An a11y label for the button.

properties.name: chevron
properties.description: Places a chevron to the right or left of a button's text.

properties.name: brand
properties.description: Determines the brand styles to apply.

properties.name: selected
properties.description: Represents which tab is currently selected.

events.name: fds-tab-changed
events.description: Called when a tab is changed.

slots.name: links
slots.description: The tabs that link to a panel.

slots.name: panel
slots.description: The content that corresponds to each tab.

tags.name: fds-tab
tags.description: A tab that serves as a link to a panel.

properties.name: selected
properties.description: Is applied to the active tab.

properties.name: link
properties.description: Represents which panel corresponds to the tab.

events.name: fds-tab-changed
events.description: Called when a tab is changed.

tags.name: fds-tab-panel
tags.description: Shows the contents of a tab.

properties.name: selected
properties.description: Is applied to the active panel.

properties.name: panel
properties.description: The name of the panel for linking purposes.

properties.name: currentPage
properties.description: The current page of the paginator.

properties.name: totalPages
properties.description: The total number of pages for the paginator.

properties.name: desktopBreakpoint
properties.description: The point, in pixels, where the paginator displays it's desktop version.

properties.name: truncate
properties.description: Determines if the paginator should be truncated.

properties.name: truncatedLastOnly
properties.description: Determines if only the ending should be truncated.

properties.name: truncatedFirstOnly
properties.description: Determines if only the beginning should be truncated.

events.name: fds-pagination-item-clicked
events.description: Fired anytime a pagination item is clicked
